[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Obsidia gains <font color="a6aafb">Bone Energy</font> whenever she deals damage. Basic Attacks grant 1 Energy against non-hero units and 2 against hero units. Skills grant Energy equal to 3 times the amount granted by Basic Attacks against the same unit type. No Energy is gained from hitting creeps.

When <font color="a6aafb">Bone Energy</font> reaches 30, it forms a <font color="a6aafb">Bone Shard</font>, up to 25 shards. Killing an enemy hero directly grants 1 <font color="a6aafb">Bone Shard(s)</font>. When Obsidia uses Basic Attacks, all <font color="a6aafb">Bone Shards</font> strike the target, each dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+7% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and inheriting 7% Attack Effects.

 Obsidia's Basic Attacks deal 80<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, inheriting 70% Attack Effects.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_2_1_18/100_636c671e6ea7c9fd89e992c42fb9f4dc.png","skillid":13040,"skillname":"Return to Bone","skilltag":[{"tagid":62,"tagname":"Buff","tagrgb":"79,156,184"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 4.5   Mana Cost: 35","skilldesc":"Obsidia launches an <font color="a6aafb">Abyssal Bone Needle</font>, dealing 325<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and triggering <font color="a6aafb">Return to Bone</font> on the first enemy hero struck.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_2_1_18/100_6a6cfd77d892164ae8fbb98819a7233b.png","skillid":13010,"skillname":"Abyssal Bone Needle","skilltag":[{"tagid":33,"tagname":"Damage","tagrgb":"199,121,85"},{"tagid":32,"tagname":"AOE","tagrgb":"199,121,85"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 4.5   Mana Cost: 35","skilldesc":"Obsidia descends into the Abyss and enters <font color="a6aafb">Shadowmeld Form</font>, gaining 500% Movement Speed for 0.3s.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_2_1_18/100_27b8bf74b5f22a09a7ae1e4d0c69c056.png","skillid":13020,"skillname":"Phantom Shadowmeld","skilltag":[{"tagid":61,"tagname":"Speed Up","tagrgb":"79,156,184"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 40   Mana Cost: 100","skilldesc":"Obsidia shoots <font color="a6aafb">Bones of Wrath</font> in the target direction, dealing 125<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, briefly stunning the first enemy hero hit, and pulling herself to the target. The <font color="a6aafb">Bones of Wrath</font> then tether Obsidia to the enemy, preventing her from moving more than 4 units away. While tethered, the enemy cannot use displacement skills, and their movement will drag Obsidia along. During this time, Obsidia gains 5 temporary <font color="a6aafb">Bone Shard(s)</font> and 30% Attack Speed. This effect lasts 3s.

While tethered, Obsidia can move through obstacles and use Basic Attacks while moving. <font color="a6aafb">Phantom Shadowmeld</font> is enhanced, with its duration increased to 1s and cooldown reduced to 33%.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_2_1_18/100_4b023cbf620869d7596b5e87e467c7c8.png","skillid":13030,"skillname":"Hunt of Bone","skilltag":[{"tagid":21,"tagname":"CC","tagrgb":"205,93,109"},{"tagid":81,"tagname":"Mobility","tagrgb":"162,105,198"}],"skillvideo":""}],"skilllistid":"1301"}]

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"<font color="a6aafb">Phoenix Crown</font>: When Zetian hits enemy heroes with <font color="a6aafb">Phoenix Strike</font> or <font color="a6aafb">Phoenix Descent</font>, she gains 1% Spell Vamp for 5s, stacking up to 10 times.

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"After casting a skill, Kalea creates a <font color="a6aafb">Water Zone</font> on the ground. When Kalea casts a skill within this zone, she will absorb the Water Zone to enhance her next three Basic Attacks with different effects:

Third Basic Attack: Kalea uses her tail to strike the area around her target, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and creating a new <font color="a6aafb">Water Zone</font>. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Aamon enters the <font color="a6aafb">Camouflage</font> state each time he hits an enemy with a skill, during which he cannot be targeted, recovers 25<font color="62f8fe"> (+15% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 3% of his lost HP every 0.5s, and gains 80% extra Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s.

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Mathilda gains <font color="a6aafb">Ancestral Guidance</font> while moving. Subsequent damage dealt by wisps to the same target decays to 40%.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_4b41810acba280a3b6e9bba321bfbb74.png","skillid":10210,"skillname":"Soul Bloom","skilltag":[{"tagid":31,"tagname":"Burst","tagrgb":"199,121,85"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 13.5   Mana Cost: 60","skilldesc":"Mathilda leaps in the target direction and creates a field around her, gaining a 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+180% Total Magic Power)</font> shield and 25% extra Movement Speed for 3s. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"When Yve deals damage to enemy heroes with her skills, she gains Galactic Power (cooldown: 0.5s), up to 3 stacks. <font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Yve commands the Crystal to fire materialized energy in the target direction for 2.7s, dealing 75<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.45s to enemies hit and slowing them by 30%. <font color="a6aafb">Tap</font>: Deals 340<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in the target area.
<font color="a6aafb">Swipe</font>: Deals 85<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.45s to enemies in the target area for 2.7s and slows them by 60%.

Yve cannot be displaced while the Starfield is active, and the Starfield will remain even if Yve is controlled (except for Suppression).","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_ee253ff416a10efd76a13cedce9aab4e.png","skillid":10130,"skillname":"Real World Manipulation","skilltag":[{"tagid":31,"tagname":"Burst","tagrgb":"199,121,85"},{"tagid":21,"tagname":"CC","tagrgb":"205,93,109"}],"skillvideo":""}],"skilllistid":"1011"}]

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"With his Basic Attacks resonated with the Abyss Power within his body, Brody is able to move while winding up his Basic Attacks (which will be interrupted when casting skills), at the cost of having longer Basic Attack Animation and lower Attack Speed Bonus. Each Basic Attack deals <font color="fba51f"> (+140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">(+45*Hero Level)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> (of which the damage scaling with level cannot be critical), increases Movement Speed by 30% (which will decay rapidly in 1.2s), and applies 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font> on the enemy, capped at 4 stacks.
Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font> increases Brody's damage against the target by 5% and his Movement Speed by 5%.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_f8af16b9b9818804317127362cc3e78f.png","skillid":10040,"skillname":"Abyss Corrosion","skilltag":[{"tagid":62,"tagname":"Buff","tagrgb":"79,156,184"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 4   Mana Cost: 40","skilldesc":"Brody launches a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+170% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, slowing the enemies by 30% for 1.2s, and applying 1 stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font>.

As the shock wave travels, for each enemy it hits, it deals an extra 10% damage, inflicts extra 5% slow effect, and applies an additional stack of <font color="a6aafb">Abyss Mark</font>, capped at 130% damage, 45% slow effect, and 4 stacks. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Detona gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Big Guy</font> for 12s each time it or Barats damages an enemy with their skills (up to 10 stacks). [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Blessed by the Bear King, Masha has 3 HP bars and won't die until all of them are depleted. She can ignore an instance of damage and remove all Control effects on herself each time she loses an HP bar. When Masha only has two HP bars left, skills will only require 50% of their original HP Cost to cast. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Ling's superb Lightness Skill allows him to leap among walls. He gains 4 extra Lightness Points per second when he's on a wall and 5 extra Lightness Points each time he deals damage.

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Firaga Armor inherits 160% of X.Borg's Max HP and absorbs all incoming damage when it's active. X.Borg's attacks cause enemies to enter <font color="a6aafb">Overheated</font> state. Enemies in <font color="a6aafb">Overheated</font> state will drop Firaga Supplies when they take damage from X.Borg. Picking up supplies restores 10% of the Armor's HP (or 10 energy while in the Armorless State).

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Granger's unique Demon Hunting <font color="a6aafb">Gun</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Cannon</font> are powered by Demonic Energy. Both his weapons start with 800 max Energy. His <font color="a6aafb">Gun</font> restores 8% Energy per second while his <font color="a6aafb">Cannon</font> restores 2% Energy per second. Killing a Minion / Creep permanently increases their max Energy by 6 / 6, and instantly restores their Energy by 5% / 5%, respectively. Each kill or assist on an enemy hero permanently increases both weapons' max Energy by 12 and instantly restores 10% Energy.

Every 1% Cooldown Reduction converts to 2 Physical Attack. Demonic Energy costs are not affected by Energy Cost Reduction.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_1_9_22/100_bc047a2c81d46bab9fbb33613806eb2d.png","skillid":7940,"skillname":"Capriccio","skilltag":[{"tagid":33,"tagname":"Damage","tagrgb":"199,121,85"},{"tagid":62,"tagname":"Buff","tagrgb":"79,156,184"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 0.3","skilldesc":"Granger rapidly fires 6 shot(s) with his <font color="a6aafb">Gun</font>, with each shot dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+45% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and consuming 70 <font color="a6aafb">Gun</font> Energy. The last shot is guaranteed to Crit. While firing, Granger's Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

Granger stops firing when he runs out of Energy, or when the skill is cast again. <font color="a6aafb">Rhapsody</font> has no cooldown and can be cast once his <font color="a6aafb">Gun</font> Energy is over 420.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_1_9_22/100_4d4dbe5a7f0b4f112e719be3024cf8b0.png","skillid":7910,"skillname":"Rhapsody","skilltag":[{"tagid":31,"tagname":"Burst","tagrgb":"199,121,85"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 12","skilldesc":"Granger uses his Demon Hunter agility to dash in the target direction, instantly restoring 15% Energy for his <font color="a6aafb">Gun</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Rondo</font> can be cast while channeling <font color="a6aafb">Rhapsody</font>. Each time <font color="a6aafb">Rhapsody</font> hits an enemy, <font color="a6aafb">Rondo's</font> Cooldown is reduced by 0.5s.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_1_9_22/100_a33c876aa83af3bed09b1e6a8d16f638.png","skillid":7920,"skillname":"Rondo","skilltag":[{"tagid":81,"tagname":"Mobility","tagrgb":"162,105,198"},{"tagid":62,"tagname":"Buff","tagrgb":"79,156,184"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 0.6   Energy Cost: 250","skilldesc":"Granger fires his <font color="a6aafb">Cannon</font> in the target direction, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+110% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hero hit and other targets in the blast radius. Targets hit will be briefly slowed. Granger can roll in the Joystick's direction after each shot.
<font color="a6aafb">Death Sonata</font> can be cast while firing <font color="a6aafb">Rhapsody</font>. <font color="a6aafb">Death Sonata</font> has a brief cooldown and consumes 250 of Granger's <font color="a6aafb">Cannon</font> Energy per shot.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage_1_9_22/100_228164a926a169586aec6f69aa68a128.png","skillid":7930,"skillname":"Death Sonata","skilltag":[{"tagid":31,"tagname":"Burst","tagrgb":"199,121,85"},{"tagid":22,"tagname":"Slow","tagrgb":"205,93,109"}],"skillvideo":""}],"skilllistid":"791"}]

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Khufra activates the Spell Curse left by Esmeralda every 8s, enhancing his next Basic Attack. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Every time Badang's Basic Attack hits a target, he gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Chivalry Fist</font>. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Every 4s, Faramis' next skill against enemy heroes and summoned objects generates a soul fragment on the spot. Enemies that die around Faramis also have a chance to drop soul fragments.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_ce73fa0ade8a10b183814b1a73f4364d.png","skillid":7640,"skillname":"Vicious Retrieval","skilltag":[{"tagid":62,"tagname":"Buff","tagrgb":"79,156,184"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 15   Mana Cost: 70","skilldesc":"Faramis enters the Shadow state for 3s, gaining 70% extra Movement Speed, 25 extra Physical & Magic Defense, 20% cooldown reduction of this skill, and the ability to move through terrain. Upon leaving the Shadow state, Faramis drags all the marked enemy heroes toward him, dealing 250<font color=\"62f8fe\"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color=\"7f62fe\">Magic Damage</font>. Use again to leave the Shadow state early and drag marked enemies toward him.\nThe range of soul fragment absorption is increased while this skill is active.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_b78fdaeaae006f2d188d3c19c33abe74.png","skillid":7610,"skillname":"Shadow Stampede","skilltag":[{"tagid":62,"tagname":"Buff","tagrgb":"79,156,184"},{"tagid":21,"tagname":"CC","tagrgb":"205,93,109"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 6   Mana Cost: 45","skilldesc":"Faramis gathers Nether energy in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing 330<font color=\"62f8fe\"> (+144% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color=\"7f62fe\">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Kadita gains the <font color="a6aafb">Blessing of the Ocean</font> every 30s. <font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Kadita exits the wave without interrupting the wave's movement.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_167f6356afa763ceaa72fdf875770531.png","skillid":7510,"skillname":"Ocean Ode","skilltag":[{"tagid":81,"tagname":"Mobility","tagrgb":"162,105,198"},{"tagid":32,"tagname":"AOE","tagrgb":"199,121,85"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 8   Mana Cost: 75","skilldesc":"After a short delay, Kadita summons an ocean wave to erupt at the target location, dealing 350<font color="62f8fe"> (+140% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 1s.

[{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Helcurt remains in <font color="a6aafb">Prowler</font> state until spotted by the enemy team, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed, and continuously regenerating <font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> HP if he has not dealt any damage.

Any hero killed after being hit by Helcurt leaves a <font color="a6aafb">dark fog</font> that explodes and spreads with a cooldown of 10s. Helcurt <font color="a6aafb">Conceals</font> himself while within the <font color="a6aafb">dark fog</font>.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_dc8d2817dd15f112fee407d391b40263.png","skillid":5140,"skillname":"Shadow of Styx","skilltag":[{"tagid":62,"tagname":"Buff","tagrgb":"79,156,184"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 15","skilldesc":"<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: When Helcurt is in <font color="a6aafb">Prowler</font> state, the skill <font color="a6aafb">terrifies</font> enemy heroes hit and briefly reveals them. <font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Helcurt blinks to the target location and deals 150<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within the area, reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 0.75s.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_c382e8831549b8418b96bd2bf1a1a747.png","skillid":5110,"skillname":"Hidden Terror","skilltag":[{"tagid":81,"tagname":"Mobility","tagrgb":"162,105,198"},{"tagid":21,"tagname":"CC","tagrgb":"205,93,109"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 4","skilldesc":"<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Helcurt gains one Deadly Stinger for every 1.5s spent in <font color="a6aafb">Prowler</font> state or on each Basic Attack. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Upon death, Zhask summons a frenzied <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> on the spot, which gradually loses HP over time until death.","skillicon":"https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_c917fad570226db1fe802ef590ce37dc.png","skillid":5050,"skillname":"Decimation","skilltag":[{"tagid":71,"tagname":"Summon","tagrgb":"97,127,198"}],"skillvideo":""},{"skillcd&cost":"CD: 13   Mana Cost: 60","skilldesc":"Zhask summons a <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> that inherits 55% of his Attributes (HP, Hybrid Defense, and Magic Power). <font color="a6aafb">Nightmaric Spawn</font> will automatically attack nearby enemies by firing a <font color="a6aafb">Death Ray</font> at the target, dealing 55 (+<font color="26e407">20% extra Attack Speed</font>) (+<font color="62f8fe">20% Magic Power</font>) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and slowing them by up to 30%. [{"skilllist":[{"skillcd&cost":"","skilldesc":"Upon death, Diggie reverses time and turns back to egg form, in which he can continue to move around and gains a new set of skills.
